author: Felicia Schwartz
title: New, Old Headaches to Greet Tillerson on Trip Middle East Trip
text:
WASHINGTON—A rare confrontation between Israel and Syria’s Iran-backed military added unexpected new complications to plans by Secretary of State Rex Tillerson for a five-city trip through the Middle East, where he already was set to confront strains.
Hours before leaving on Saturday, Mr. Tillerson spoke with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, assuring him that the U.S. supports Israel’s right to defend itself, Undersecretary of State Steve Goldstein said. The call took place after an Israeli plane was downed following... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
